textos_fuente.text: About Us - Deer Creek Golf Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Facebook Twitter Book Tee Times Deer Creek Golf Club University Park, IL Home Tee Times About Us Contact Us Rates Scorecard Course Photos Leagues Memberships Deer Creek Golf Club University Park, IL Instruction Events Upcoming Events Banquets Text Club About Us The Golf Shop Purchase a gift certificate from Deer Creek for every golfer on your gift-giving list! Gift certificates are available in any dollar increment and can be applied to our golf instruction, rounds of golf, or merchandise. Deer Creek’s Pro Shop offers a full line of professional goods and services. Staff Our friendly staff will help you with all your golfing needs from booking tee-times to buying supplies, to joining one of our popular leagues. Amenities Deer Creek has cart paths throughout the course. We never close – think of us as your sure thing – if you want to play golf in any conditions. Directions Deer Creek is easy to get to. We are located just 25 miles from Chicago and equidistant between Interstates 57 and 394. Just go to our maps in the drop down menu and “Google” us. Page Footer Contact Info Address : 25055 S. Western Ave University Park, IL 60484 Email : golf@deercreekgolfcourse.com Phone : 1-708-672-6667 Copyright © 2025 Deer Creek Golf Club All Rights Reserved. Powered by

Ashley + Eric | Deer Creek Country Club, Deerfield Beach – Dalsimer-  South Florida Special Event Decor Skip to content Facebook Instagram Twitter Pinterest Linkedin (954) 418-0608 Home Gallery Weddings Mitzvahs Social Corporate Services Our Story Testimonials Venues Blog Event Basics 101 Wedding Mitzvahs Social Connect Menu Home Gallery Weddings Mitzvahs Social Corporate Services Our Story Testimonials Venues Blog Event Basics 101 Wedding Mitzvahs Social Connect MENU Ashley + Eric | Deer Creek Country Club, Deerfield Beach Home Weddings Ashley + Eric | Deer Creek Country Club, Deerfield Beach Elegant and romantic, yet relaxed, was definitely the vibe of Ashley and Eric’s wedding. The Deer Creek Golf & Country Club was the venue of choice to host the couple’s memorable day. The bride requested blush pink, gold, white, and ivory tones which worked well to accomplish the look, both indoors and out. She carried a French hand-wrapped bouquet which included roses, lisianthus, matthiola, hydrangea, and touches of silver dollar eucalyptus and ruscus. The bouquet’s natural design with varying texture and color palette blended beautifully and complemented the chuppah, and more importantly, her groom’s dark grey tuxedo. The four-post structure featuring sheer white fabric was drawn open and appointed with stylish clusters of the petite bride’s floral selection. The upper portion held a large spray of flowers with plenty of greenery delicately placed throughout. State-of-the-art LED lighting completed the effect when it illuminated the traditional canopy. After the ceremony, guests gathered to celebrate the newlyweds in the Key West Ballroom. Elevated lush floral arrangements filled the newly renovated space along with many variations of candlelight. Soft foliage, rose petals, and gold accents added to the intimate affair. Deerfield Beach’s premier county club certainly was a picturesque paradise for the new “Mr. & Mrs. Goldman”. Venue/Caterer: Deer Creek Golf & Country Club Decor: Dalsimer Atlas Floral & Event Decorators Photography: Poirier Wedding Photography award-winning south florida florist award-winning south florida wedding decor dalsimer atlas floral and event decorators dalsimer designs dalsimer spitz and peck deer creek country club weddings Poirier Wedding Photography south florida event decorators south florida event designers south florida event producers south florida wedding decor south florida wedding florist wedding florist Facebook Twitter LinkedIn Rachel + Joseph | Four Seasons Palm Beach Previous Melissa + Harrison | Mizner Country Club, Delray Beach Next Recommended Posts Rachel + Jake | B’nai Torah Congregation, Boca Raton Melissa + Harrison | Mizner Country Club, Delray Beach Rachel + Joseph | Four Seasons Palm Beach Recent Posts Rachel + Jake | B’nai Torah Congregation, Boca Raton Melissa + Harrison | Mizner Country Club, Delray Beach Ashley + Eric | Deer Creek Country Club, Deerfield Beach Rachel + Joseph | Four Seasons Palm Beach All That Jazz | Boca Raton Resort & Club Like Us On Facebook Follow on Instagram For over 100 years, Dalsimer Atlas Floral & Event Decorators has strived for exceptional service, outstanding value, and magnificent design while celebrating life’s milestone moments. For more information and to schedule an appointment, please call 954-418-0608 or contact us by email at SpecialEvents@Dalsimer.com . Please be sure to "like" us on Facebook and "follow" us on Instagram , Pinterest , and Twitter . View Detail Deer Creek Leagues and Groups Info Learn about it here! Contact Email: info@deercreekrvgolf.com Address: 42749 Hwy 27
Davenport, FL 33837 Phone: 863.424.3153 Find us on: Facebook page opens in new window Website page opens in new window Our Mission It is our mission to provide a fun, yet challenging golf experience while at the same time fostering fellowship and camaraderie among our players. We strive daily to accomplish this mission by: Presenting and maintaining our golf course at a high standard while showcasing its natural characteristics. Treating our fellow members, employees and guests with respect and providing a satisfying game of golf to all players regardless of playing ability. Making our club enjoyable, accessible and affordable for our members, their families as well as guests. Use our Contact Form to get in touch We'd always love to hear from you. About Us – Cross Creek CDD Skip to content Information Calendar Documents Links Contact Information Calendar Documents Links Contact About Us The University Park Recreation District was formed by Manatee County on August 2, 2018 to purchase, operate and maintain the University Park Country Club and its related facilities along with +/- 100 acres of conservation and open space land in the District. Establishment Manatee County formed the University Park Recreation District via Ordinance 18-29 pursuant to Chapter 418, F.S. based on a petition signed by over 80% of District residents requesting the formation of the District. Ordinance 18-29, amended by Ordinance 23-95 PDF | RTF Legal Description PDF | RTF District Boundaries Map PDF | RTF Mission, Vision, Values Our Mission: Deliver to members and guests ever evolving lifestyle experiences that are engaging and inclusive by providing exemplary service, facilities and amenities. Our Vision: To be the preeminent gathering place for members and guests to meet, socialize and enjoy lifestyle  opportunities that exceed their expectations in a modern club environment, that also enhances our residential community. Our Core Values: Values that are truly important direct the decision we make, define our character, and preserve what is special about our Club. They are: Integrity, Trust & Mutual Respect – Acting ethically in the best interests of our members, staff and community. Quality – Striving to be the best that can be in all that we do. Fiscal Responsibility and Transparency – Openly communicating our financial position and ensuring that operating budgets and reserves are sufficient to meet the current and future needs of the Club. Environmental stewardship – Commitment to preserving our natural landscape and considering the environmental impact of our decisions. Contact Information District Manager & Registered Agent Venessa Ripoll 3501 Quadrangle Blvd., Suite 270 Orlando FL 32817 ripollv@pfm.com Phone: (407) 723-5900 District Records Custodian 3501 Quadrangle Blvd., Suite 270 Orlando FL 32817 recordrequest@pfm.com Phone: (407) 723-5900 Community Resources Clerk of Court County Government Property Appraiser School Board Supervisor of Elections Tax Collector Explore Cross Creek CDD Information Calendar Documents Links Contact Privacy Policy* Under Florida law, e-mail addresses provided to local governments, including the Cross Creek CDD , are public records. If you do not want your e-mail address released in response to a public records request, do not send electronic mail to this entity. Instead, contact this office by phone or in writing at https://www.crosscreekcdd.org

Wedding Menus & Banquet Catering from Deer Creek Golf Club Wedding Menus & Banquet Catering from Deer Creek Golf Club ABOUT US History Our Location Career Opportunities Reviews THE COURSE The Golf Course Tour Flyovers Corporate Tournaments Tee Times Internet Membership Rates CLUBHOUSE & FACILITIES The Clubhouse The Deer Creek Grille Holiday Dining Driving Range Golf Pro Shop Conference Facility Golf Lessons and Schools Navigating Obstacles Hitting Out of Fairway Bunkers EVENTS Wedding Venue Baby Shower Venue Catered Events Menus Class Reunion Venue Corporate Event Venue Seminars Networking Board Meeting Team-Building Engagement Party Venue Event Space Family Reunion Venue Golf Fundraising Event Venue Special Events Themed Party Venue MEMBERSHIP REVIEWS BLOG Articles CONTACT US Select Page Wedding Menus and Special Event Catering It is with great pleasure that we at Deer Creek Golf Club present the following pages of our extensive customizable wedding packages and event menu selections. Our wedding menus have been carefully crafted by Deer Creek chefs who have more than 30 years of experience planning and providing exceptional wedding catering services. Our staff makes all the difference. We strive to offer traditional wedding menu options as well as catering for modern tastes and sensibilities. We hope that these carefully prepared menus and beverage suggestions are helpful to you in planning your wedding. Choose a wedding catering package that meets your needs. However, as always, we stand ready to prepare a custom wedding menu if you so desire. Our wedding caterers and coordinators have worked with couples and families with every possible taste. There are no requests we cannot handle. The following information will help you to plan that successful and memorable wedding day. Let the Deer Creek Country Club Catering professionals assist you in creating your dream wedding. Contact us directly at 954-426-6588 or email at catering@deercreekflorida.com to discuss your wedding catering needs. Wedding Caterers We are proud to announce that Deer Creek Golf Club has won Wedding Wire’s Couple Choice award for the past 2 years in a row. Visit our wedding catering reviews page to see what other couples have said about the service and catering at Deer Creek Golf Club. The Deer Creek Banquet room for Weddings accommodates up to 200 guests, and our wedding caterers are prepared to deliver exceptional food to every guest. Our wedding caterers and coordinators can make a large wedding feel intimate, and a smaller wedding feel lavish and luxurious. Meet with our wedding caterers to sample food and customize your wedding menu. We will then finalize the menu and ensure that the food is memorable and of the freshest highest quality. All wedding catering costs will vary depending on the menu selections as well as the number of guests that are catered for. Our coordinators work with couples who have established wedding budgets to ensure that they receive the wedding of their dreams at a cost that makes sense to them. Contact the catering department at Deer Creek Golf Club to discuss catering prices and to book a date for your banquet hall tour and wedding menu tasting: 954-426-6588 or email at catering@deercreekflorida.com . Special Event Catering We go beyond wedding menus. Our chefs provide catering services for South Florida events of all kinds. Guests can choose catering for rehearsal dinners, bridal showers, and engagement parties as well. We have a beautiful smaller ballroom that is perfect for more intimate events and it had a capacity of 75 guests. Our event caterers are all in house, allowing us to provide the event venue as well as the catering services all in one location. No matter the event, no matter the menu, we can help. Call our catering department for more information. Deer Creek Golf Club 2801 Deer Creek Country Club Blvd. Deerfield Beach, Florida 33442 USA Phone: 954-429-0006 CLICK FOR MAP Our Course Clubhouse and Facilities ADA Compliance BLOG ©  2023 - Deer Creek Golf Club.

By Metroland Staff Ajax News Advertiser Feb 6, 2025 Thursday, February 6, 2025 1 min to read Article was updated Feb 7, 2025 Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save JOIN THE CONVERSATION Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Andrew McLennan teed off during the June 9 Regional Chair’s Golf Tournament at Deer Creek Golf and Banquet Facility in 2022. Deer Creek was recently sold for $45 million. Metroland file photo Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save Canada’s largest owner, operator and manager of golf and country clubs has purchased Deer Creek. ClubLink Corporation ULC (a subsidiary of TWC Enterprises Limited) has acquired the popular Ajax golf and country club for $45 million. Established in 1989 by late philanthropist and developer Jerry Coughlan , Deer Creek offers 45 holes, a nine-hole short course, a large driving range and a performance academy, anchored by a 57,000-square-foot clubhouse and event centre. ARTICLE CONTINUES BELOW “The Deer Creek operations were built on the Coughlan Family principles of providing a great product and exceptional service,” said Scott Collins, Deer Creek’s president and CEO. “We believe ClubLink is uniquely positioned to continue the legacy envisioned by Jerry Coughlan and delivered by countless valued team members.” Located on 445 acres of land, Deer Creek will continue to serve daily fee golfers, members, tournaments, weddings, banquets and restaurant guests, according to a media release. ARTICLE CONTINUES BELOW “We are grateful to the Coughlan family for the opportunity to carry forward the legacy of Deer Creek,” said Rai Sahi, ClubLink’s chair and CEO. “Acquiring Deer Creek adds value to the ClubLink experience and demonstrates a commitment to our core business of providing great golf and hospitality for our members and guests.” A.M. Home • Deer Creek RV Park Online Resource Site Skip to content 863.424.2839 42749 US Hwy 27 Davenport, FL 33837 Facebook page opens in new window X page opens in new window Dribbble page opens in new window Deer Creek RV Park Online Resource Site Deer Creek RV Park Online Resource Site Home Activities Deer Tales and Daily Activities 2025 Activities Blog and Pictures Administration Board of Directors DC HOA Presidents DC Office Announcements Rules and Regulations Important Forms Golf Communities Eagles View Community Pages Osprey Point Community Pages Partridge Pines Community Pages Regal Pointe Community Pages Regal Ridge Community Pages Impressions T&S Impressions – Deer Creek T&S Impressions – Communities T&S Impressions – Activities T&S Impressions – Golf Home Activities Deer Tales and Daily Activities 2025 Activities Blog and Pictures Administration Board of Directors DC HOA Presidents DC Office Announcements Rules and Regulations Important Forms Golf Communities Eagles View Community Pages Osprey Point Community Pages Partridge Pines Community Pages Regal Pointe Community Pages Regal Ridge Community Pages Impressions T&S Impressions – Deer Creek T&S Impressions – Communities T&S Impressions – Activities T&S Impressions – Golf Deer Creek RV Golf and Country Club The Perfect Place to Call Home Built around an 18-hole Executive Golf Course, our gated communities have a full range of amenities. Our activity calendars are jam-packed with something for everyone. Try Deer Creek’s Executive Golf Course and visit our Pro Shop. Both are open to the public. The friendliness of the people in our communities offers a feeling of home. Many residents came for a season and loved our community so much that they have stayed for years! About Us See our Communities Each community has their own pool, 5 feature clubhouses. The perfect place for community dinners, potlucks, meetings, games, events and more… Learn More Deer Creek Administration Our Corporate Management, Corporate Board of Directors and Administration is dedicated to making our communities flourish and continuously improve the quality, value and diversity of our common areas. Learn More See our Activities Thanks to our amazing Activities Director we enjoy shows, live musicians, parties, Karaoke, talks, games, arts and crafts, tournaments and so much more… Learn More Our Golf Pro Shop Our Pro Shop is fully stocked for all your golfing needs. We carry major name brand merchandise including golf bags, balls, clubs, and apparel. Come and join us for a nice round of Golf on our Executive 18 hole golf course. Learn More Looking to Rent or Buy? If you are looking to rent, buy or lease a house, RV lot or a combination of both, please follow this link to Oats Realty Learn More Please update your Information! To facilitate the upcoming budget, phase election and Member at Large/Annual Meeting, we are requesting that ALL homeowners use this link to update/confirm their email address(s) and information sheet.  ALL new owners should complete this and any owner with any changes/updates should complete as well. Owner Information Form Link Location, Location, Location We are located adjacent to one of Florida’s premier road intersections, I-4 and US Hwy 27. It is less than 30 minutes to the Walt Disney World Theme parks, about 45 minutes to Orlando. Right next door is Posner Park and Posner Village featuring an amazing selection of stores, restaurants and even a Movie Theater. See our Community Map Get in Touch We are NOT a Campground or RV Park. Please DO NOT send requests for campsites using this form. About Us | River Creek Club | Leesburg, VA × Thank you for visiting our site. Please review our Privacy Policy . We use cookies on our site and collect other information pursuant to our Privacy Policy. By continuing to use our site, you consent to our Privacy Policy and data collection practices. OK Skip to Content Opens in new tab Member Login Benefits Finder Opens in new tab Careers River Creek Club Main Site Navigation Who We Are Golf Amenities Membership Host An Event Join Now Host Event Login - Opens in new tab Menu Who We Are Our Team Calendar Directions & Hours Golf Golf Course Coaching & Club Fitting Game On Golf Lessons Crush It! Youth Golf Lessons Amenities Dining Racquet Sports Swimming Fitness Membership XLife Benefits Host An Event Tournaments & Outings Weddings Meetings & Corporate Event Spaces Contact Us Opens in new tab Member Login Benefits Finder Opens in new tab Careers Home Who We Are Skip Image Carousel Our Team Calendar Directions & Hours Who We Are River Creek is a luxurious, welcoming country club situated on the banks of the Potomac, an area rich in American history. Here, you’ll find a relaxed, resort experience featuring exceptional service, an exquisitely maintained Ault-Clark (a local favorite!) championship golf course, recreational opportunities, first-class amenities, and patio dining for our diverse membership. We cultivate an exclusive feel in an inclusive, comfortable environment. Gather with family, make friends, meet your neighbors, create connections, and have fun - River Creek is your home away from home! Schedule A Tour Explore Our Golf Course Peter Miller General Manager Contact Me 703-779-2022 ext. 5386 Contact Me About Peter + Close Peter Miller information modal Peter Miller General Manager Serving since 2021 703-779-2022 ext. 5386 Peter.Miller 703-779-2022 ext. 5386 Peter.Miller Contact Me About Peter Pete comes to River Creek after managing Fords Colony Country Club, where he served a dynamic and diverse membership and a club that included 54 holes of golf, 2 restaurants and 3,000 homes surrounding the course in Williamsburg, Virginia. His previous club and hospitality experience includes General Manager at Redstick Country Club in Vero Beach, FL, General Manager at Rehoboth Beach Country Club in Delaware, General Manager at the City Club of Washington in DC, Chef and Manager at The Four Seasons Atlanta, Manager and Director of Banquets and Private Dining Sales at Maggiano’s in Chicago (Brinker International). In addition, Pete earned a culinary degree from the Art Institute of Atlanta and is a certified Executive Chef. Highlights of his culinary career include cooking for Madonna, Paul McCartney, two presidents and three first ladies. Pete enjoys spending his free time with his wife Kristin and two daughters Charlotte and Kate.
